December L, 1956
Dr. Harry J. Skornia
NAEB Headquarters
lL Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Harry:
Just a note to say that I would be more than happy to do
any number of digests -- within reason, of course --of
research studies or articles for Factsheets. I definitely
believe that this service should be continued by NAEB and am
more than willing to assist.
As a matter of fact, I’m going to be disappointed if I
don’t get some assignments from you.
Cordially,
Jr.
LM:pa
